bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXVI (Nos 2745-2800) with contributions by G.M. Browne, D. Jordan, A.H.R.E. Paap, D. Rokeah, A. Swiderek

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Coles R.A., D. Foraboschi, A.H. Soliman el-Mosallamy, J.R. Rea and Ursula Schlag, with contributions by G.M. Browne, D. Jordan, A.H.R.E. Paap, D. Rokeah, A. Swiderek, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXVI (Nos 2745-2800). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 51.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1970, 8°, xv-115 pp. et VIII pll.

C.R. par Zbigniew Borkowski, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 264-267. - Hélène Cadell, REG 85 (1972) pp. 230-232. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 40 (1971) p. 369. - Paul Mertens, BibO 29 (1972) pp. 191-192. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 49 (1969) pp. 277-280. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 46 (1971) No. 91, pp. 180-187. - G. Tévar, StPap 10 (1971) pp. 134-135. - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 21 (1970) pp. 330-336. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 90 (1973) pp. 372-381 (concerne aussi P. Oxy. XXXVII et XXXVIII).
Coles Foraboschi el-Mosallamy Rea Schlag Browne Jordan Paap Rokeah Swiderek
